Articles.Content:
The vab seems to be calculating rocket height as if the parachutes were deployed. MOLE's MK1 Flight Control Package and Sounding Rocket's 0.35 and 0.625 nosecone parachutes all add ~9m. The mk16, RealChute's Cone Chute, and radials all work correctly. According to ckan all are up to date as of last night.

KSP 1.0.5.1028
